summary: Fix mobile issues: playlist favorites backend missing/broken (save per user) and playlist sharing missing (generate playlist deep link using existing song hash/query pattern; enable copy/share from ⋮ menu without redesign).
architectural_notes: Playlist deep links must reuse the existing song deep-link hash/query pattern, targeting playlists instead of songs.
known_issues: Add to Favorites fails because playlist favorites backend is missing or broken (needs per-user persistence).
Playlist Share button is broken because no share/deep-link logic is implemented (mobile).

existing_features.title: Fix the mobile playlist Favorites UI so tapping “Add to Favorites” / “Remove from Favorites” in the mobile playlist overflow menu successfully saves per-user favorites via the backend and updates UI state.

Fix the mobile playlist Share action so it generates a playlist deep link using the same hash/query deep-link pattern used for songs (playlist instead of song) and allows users to share via native share sheet when supported, otherwise copies to clipboard, without redesigning the menu.

new_feature_requests.summary: Fix playlist Favorites so favorited playlists are persisted per user (not admin-only); currently backend missing/broken (mobile scope).
Implement mobile playlist Share: generate playlist deep link using same existing song hash/query pattern; enable copy/share and make existing ⋮ menu Share action work without redesign.

Implement backend support for playlist favorites saved per authenticated user (Internet Identity principal), including endpoints used by the frontend: `getPlaylistFavorites()` and `togglePlaylistFavorite(playlistName: Text)`.

projectName: Fix mobile playlist Favorites persistence per user + make mobile playlist Share action work
